title: Norman Lear
summary: Norman Milton Lear (born July 27, 1922) is an American television writer and film and television producer who has produced, written, created or developed over 100 shows.[1] Lear is known for many popular 1970s sitcoms, including All in the Family, Maude, Sanford and Son, One Day at a Time, The Jeffersons, and Good Times. Lear continues to actively produce television, with the 2017 remake of One Day at a Time and the 2021 Netflix revival of Good Times.[2]
